Nicola Willis does it again: Finance Minister makes lewd gaffe during Question Time in Parliament https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nicola-willis-does-it-again-finance-minister-makes-lewd-gaffe-during-question-time-in-parliament/46KBC6RT6VHTJP2I77ICWTB6EM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nicola-willis-does-it-again-finance-minister-makes-lewd-gaffe-during-question-time-in-parliament/46KBC6RT6VHTJP2I77ICWTB6EM/ Raphael FranksThe quip follows a prior gaffe when she asked the then minister 'how big is his hole?' She said: 'What New Zealanders care about is the size of the sausage, not how it's delivered." Photo / Parliament TV
